original_title: Remand prisoner escapes custody at Galgamuwa court premises
original_body_lines: A remand prisoner who was being taken to the Galgamuwa court has escaped from the custody of prison officers.
The escaped suspect had been arrested and remanded in custody in connection with an incident of hijacking a three-wheeler, the police said.
The suspect in question and his wife had been arrested over the relevant incident recently, and was ordered to be remanded in custody until today (28), to be produced before the Galgamuwa Court.
Accordingly, the duo had been escorted from the Wariyapola Prison, to be produced before the courts today.
However, the male suspect has escaped from the custody, at the time when they were entering the court premises after getting off the bus.
Galgamuwa Police have initiated investigations in search of the escaped remand prisoner.
